message:
White Paper: The State of Cloud Storage in 2013 Industry Report (Azure Blob Storage took over the lead this year)

http://www6.nasuni.com/the-state-of-cloud-storage-in-2013-nasuni-industry-report.html
name: http://www.nasuni.com/cloudreport
caption: www6.nasuni.com
description: In the last year, Cloud Storage Providers (CSPs) delivered over an exabyte of data under contract. This astonishing growth heralds a new era for how storage is delivered and consumed.
